website_summaries.verdict: You can't beat the price of these silicone pans. If you want to try silicone and have a tight budget, these are the pans for you.
pros: Use these pans to make full-size donuts that are easy to remove
Pans are just as easy to clean as other silicone pans on the market
cons: Pans may need a little cooking spray after repeated use
The silicone is a bit thinner than pricier sets

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied and great for Keto donuts as well as bagels!
customer_reviews.text: May be premature on the longevity front, I just received and utilized already to make Keto donuts as well as bagels. They turned out fantastic. Easy to use and easy to clean. Happy thus far!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M. Bigham

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: I saw that there may be fillers in these, but I go them anyway because they were cheap and I wanted to give a try at homemade donuts. Right out of the package, they are flimsy and the thickness is uneven. Tried baking with them and they gave off a horrible chemical smell. Ended up throwing them away. Don’t waste your money. Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Butter

customer_reviews.title: Great treat molds!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these silicone molds for baking almond-flour "bagels" as well as for freezing flavored homemade whipped cream "frozen fluff donuts", and have not been disappointed with their performance! Temperature is no issue (as expected) with these silicone molds. I received one orange and one pink 6-place silicone mold as shown in the description. No off-odor, no odd texture, and no issues so far. They are well-made, and durable. They easily clean in the dishwasher, and can nest and fold up if needed to save cabinet space. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: Denae Hudson

customer_reviews.title: No non stick oil is needed
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect. I had accidentally started pouring donut batter into the mold without non stick spray and sprayed the rest. I found that it came out very easily so technically no additional oil is needed. A must if you miss donuts and bagels and are watching your weight. And it’s fun to make!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: These little pans are great, especially when you have a craving for donuts ...
customer_reviews.text: These little pans are great, especially when you have a craving for donuts but the nearest donut shop is 30 miles away! My boys had such a great time watching them bake! The pan makes a medium size donut, easy cleanup. I am very pleased with the cost-to-quality ratio.
customer_reviews.author: shjames85

customer_reviews.title: I love this! Makes the perfect sized doughnut.
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this! It works so well. We found a recipe online for a dairy free, paleo friendly, but free, grain free chcolcate glazed doughnut, so we immediately came to Amazon to find our pan. This was delivered within 2 days and our doughnuts turned out so delicious & perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bakeware
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for baking my low carb donuts (Keto ) . And I highly recommend them some people have never heard of silicone cookware But it is actually very nice to cook with . I first bought a set of silicone cupcake trays in Argentina . Then when I moved back here to the states I saw these and had to have the, . They are very light to handle and very easy to clean . And best of all easy to store as well . I will most likely buy more because I feel every cook should have a set .m
customer_reviews.author: Doorah10

customer_reviews.title: Love this silicone donut pan!
customer_reviews.text: Whether chocolate, vanilla, strawberry glaze or regular, you can use this silicone pan to make 12 doughnuts at a time. Silicone pans can replace deep-fried doughnuts, eliminating greasy fat and making doughnuts healthier. I use it to make doughnuts for my kids because I don't want them to eat overly high-calorie deep-fried doughnuts. Drizzle with a variety of glaze flavors. My kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great donut baking molds
customer_reviews.text: They work well for baking. Cleanup is easy. Since they are flexible, you need to place them on a cookie sheet for transfer into the oven and during baking.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: NO MESS BAKING
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in hopes that they would allow me to make keto donuts and not stick to the mold like they did in my metal non stick pans.. I was amazed by how easy they slide right out and cleaned up perfectly. Definitely a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Keri F.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Product!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! A little smaller than expected but I didn’t really look at the specs before purchase which is my own problem. They washed up great too as nothing gets burnt on like on baking sheets. Some tips: make sure you only fill 1/2-3/4 of the way full or it will over flow in the oven, I placed these on a cookie sheet just in case it over flowed and it was easier to get in and out of the ove.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell when in baking
customer_reviews.text: Bad smell when baking. I have used other silicone bakeware without issue but these donut molds have an oder when they get hot. They are not easy to clean either. I sprayed them with oil and food still stuck to them.
customer_reviews.author: shiloh

customer_reviews.title: BEST DAMN PROTEIN DONUTS
customer_reviews.text: Quarantine got me like Martha Stewart and Betty Crocker! It’s also made me chubs chubs too. But no fear, because I started a cleaner version of dessert binge. So It was my first time making protein donuts and I needed pans. These looked cute. Might buy some. And sure did. Love them. They don’t even burn like the dang metal pans. Easy to clean. Nothing sticked to them. Usually if I bake, half of the mix stays on the dang metal pan. Well not anymore ! Also they come with recipes. Score. My recipe was from Kodiak pankcakes though. I modified. And damn son! Protein donuts.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Reneau

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy but works with baking sheet
customer_reviews.text: **update** I put a baking sheet under these and they worked much better! I just used these just now for the first time and they were a little hard to use. They arrived in great condition and baked well, however they are very flimsy. Next time I will try putting a baking sheet under them. If you grab both ends the middle sinks down and if your batter is runny at all it would have spilled over. It's also hard to grab out of the oven with pot holders because they arent hard like a pan is. For the lroxe they are ok but I probably should have just ran to the store and bought regular donut pans.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Fake Silicone
customer_reviews.text: Opened up the package and did the pinched test immediately! FAILED big time!!!!!! White fillers everywhere. Don’t buy it. False advertising!
customer_reviews.author: Carine M

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!
customer_reviews.text: We've began an unrefined sugar lifestyle and we have been craving donuts. My son was so excited when these molds came in and we quickly whipped up a batch. We put the batter into a ziplock bag and snipped the corner to pipe neatly into the mold. Easy release and easy to clean! Perfect donuts!
customer_reviews.author: Hendonus

customer_reviews.title: maybe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with high hopes of having some homemade chocolate cakes donuts. My mouth was ready and watering for some decadent goodness. After filling my molds with my lovely batter I carelessly tossed them along with my hopes and dreams into the oven. When I heard that musical beeping of the timer I skipped over to my oven releasing my sweet treats from their toasty abode. But when I tried to remove them from the molds it was a terrible disaster. But it may have been my fault. The batter I used has little fat and I neglected to grease the molds. Will continue to test and maybe update my findings.
customer_reviews.author: shana persaud

customer_reviews.title: I will be buying more silicone in the future.
customer_reviews.text: I was wary about these but the price was right. What a surprise. They were easy to use, easy to clean and they can be rolled up and put away in a small space. I didn't have to use a knife and wiggle the donuts out of a metal pan. I just flipped the silicone over and pushed on the bottom of each and they popped right out. So amazingly simple. So excited, I took them out and showed my mom when she was visiting. I will absolutely be buying more silicone baking products in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Cappie Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Glad with the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I just received, tried making donuts, loved the results. Easy to clean, easy to use. These came with the recipe booklet, with tips. followed their basic recipe, But used brown sugar cinnamon glaze instead of recommended by the recipe. The whole family loved them! I am so bad at baking and mess many easy recipes, surprisingly donuts came out way too good! One HAS to use these with a cookie sheet or some baking tray under, or they will wobble. These make medium size donuts, not the mini ones. These are NOT no stick, if you don’t use baking spray, u will lose donuts.
customer_reviews.author: MakorMae

customer_reviews.title: NOT FULL SIZE AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: The molds I was sent are for "Mini" donuts, not "FULL SIZE" as advertised. The molds are only 3" diameter, and full size donuts/bagels are 5+". Even accounting for increase during cooking, they could not possibly get anywhere near full size without crowding/overlapping each other. I am returning these molds, although I am having some problems with Amazon's changes in process which no longer allow me to print shipping labels at home. I have to go down to the UPS store to see if they can do it for me, in spite of the fact that I don't own a Smartphone (which Amazon assumes I own and can use for the Return at UPS).
customer_reviews.author: StephenDvd

customer_reviews.title: I like it!!
customer_reviews.text: Before buying these molds, I saw a lot of feedback, since this was my first time to buy a silicone mold. I was afraid that this material will burn, smoke or distort in the oven, so I have been staring at my oven during the production process. Fortunately, there is no accidents and no strange smell. It's so great that my doughnut is as successful as before, and it's pretty easy to put the donuts out from this material. Regarding cleaning, I just put it in the dishwasher and it works great. I think I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Esme Zhang

customer_reviews.title: You never know what you will get
customer_reviews.text: I bought theae 2 weeks ago to make keto bagels and they were great so I bought a second set. I recieved it today and they are extremely small. I dont understand why the second ones are smaller for the same product
customer_reviews.author: Kiasha P.

customer_reviews.title: One and Done
customer_reviews.text: Used once and it ripped! It was also not at all sturdy...spilled as soon as you place it down in the oven. Hard to remove from the oven once done due to the flimsy material. Final product was awful and soggy as well. Total waste.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Riley

customer_reviews.title: Not the most useful kitchen gadget
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why you have to spray these pans when they are silicone. They are so flexy you have to put then on a cookie sheet so why not just use a metal coated tray. The recipes offered are so silly I wonder who would eat the product. There are instructions an how full to fill them. I made one batch modified the pumpkin recipe (without the pumpkin) the donuts (if you can call them that) were terrible, inedible, goooy on the inside although I baked then 3 times longer than they recommended. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Fling

customer_reviews.title: Do You Know How Bad Keto Doughnuts Stick??
customer_reviews.text: Low carb baking can be a real pain, with all those eggs sticking to your bakeware. I had a doughnut pan I'd picked up at a thrift store, but getting the doughnuts out in one piece was impossible and cleaning the pan was murder. These silicon pans are amazing because you can bend the pan to help "pop" the doughnuts out, as well as turning them inside-out to clean. I still recommend oiling the pan and allowing the doughnuts to cool before removing. Also, be sure to place the pans on a baking sheet before filling with batter, or they will spill!
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Case

customer_reviews.title: Takes a bit to get clean
customer_reviews.text: This is not a quick wash like most muffin pans would be. I found that even with spraying oil, I was using a fair amount of elbow grease to get these molds completely clean. It did come with a fair amount of recipes that I will definitely try. Would have preferred a package with two of the same color.
customer_reviews.author: Jill & Albin J. Stanish

customer_reviews.title: Nice smaller molds, good buy!
customer_reviews.text: These donut molds are great. Be sure to look at dimensions before purchase, they LOOK regular size but are actually a little smaller, maybe 2" diameter molds. But that's ok!!! It makes really cute donuts, and I love how the center ring for each donut is a bit taller, so when things rise during baking, it won't get filled in. That's a really nice, underrated feature to have. Very easy to clean and use, a little on the thin side but again, look at dimensions haha. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Annazon

customer_reviews.title: NOT Full Size Donuts
customer_reviews.text: These are not full size as the description states, which ended up ruining a project I was doing with no time to get new pans. I have a full size donut pan (needed more) this isn't it. Not deep enough by about an inch. Other than that they are fine, but I would consider these somewhere between full and mini.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: missing an item
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to not find the Icing Bag as listed with these silicone trays. I went ahead and used the trays for baked donuts. I did not find any bad odor with baking as some described. I thought the donuts were a bit awkward to come out of the trays after baking because of the pliability of the silicone but with the vegetable spray that I had applied, the donuts did come right out. I think I like a metal pan better just because of the tray stability.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for satisfying donut cravings!
customer_reviews.text: I love to bake and I love donuts. Obviously I needed these pans. It's super easy to fill them (I recommend using a piping bag) and relatively easy to get the donuts out. You might want to use a little non-stick spray or just wait until the pans are cool, unlike me. You'll still get your donuts way faster than going to the store and buying some, plus you get the satisfaction of making them yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Durable and so easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, silicone is so durable and much easier to clean than anything else I've used. Just place it on a cookie sheet for support and pop them in the oven. These worked perfectly for my keto donut recipes. Donuts come out perfectly, just let them cool a little before removing them. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Raina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baked goods
customer_reviews.text: Okay these are awesome! I have come to love silicone because of how easy it is to clean and how much longer they last compared to metal pans. I made donuts and bagels with these and they were cooked perfectly and were so easy to pop out of the mold. Just be sure to put a pan under to keep it stable I t he oven’ but highly recommend if you want something easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Zentz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and WORTH it!
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure what this price would give me but these are PERFECT WORK WELL And I make low carb baked donuts for my family in them with great success. Top rack dishwasher and super easy. Under 10 bucks for two silicone molds is a deal and you won't regret it. I spray them SUPER well with Cooking spray. Everything just lifts out perfectly. No broken donuts. If you are on a low carb or want to try making healthy, buy these. You won't regret it. They even come with recipes but I invented my own using carb quik and almond flour. super yum.
customer_reviews.author: Xena

customer_reviews.title: Great donut maker!
customer_reviews.text: Love this silicon donut mold! Being on keto for over 6 months I was really missing donuts! Eating a real donut isn’t worth breaking my diet though so I searched the Internet for keto recipes... the mold is wonderful. Is lightweight, much lighter than other molds I’ve purchased in the past but it gets the job done. I’ve already used it a couple times and the results were great.
customer_reviews.author: Joy M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baking donuts
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these and they’ve proved to be a lot easier to use than metal donut pans, not only in terms of consistent baking but also in terms of removing the donuts perfectly intact. Takes around 20 mins to make apple cider donuts start to finish, so these are a big win in our house. Nice to get the free leaflet of donut recipes too
customer_reviews.author: MrGraingerPA

customer_reviews.title: Work great until you have to clean them
customer_reviews.text: These don't clean up well at all. I hand washed the first few times and then put in the top rack of the dishwasher the last time because all the dough wouldn't come out. They now have permanent white stains on them. I've put most if not all my other silicone products in the dishwasher and none have come out like these did.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Nice pans!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these six times now. I’ve tried some baked doughnut recipes I found in Pinterest and the chocolate doughnut recipe that came with the pans. So far, I’ve been really pleased! Use a bit of cooking spray and the treats will tumble out cleanly. They wash well in the dishwasher. They are orange and pink, as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Easy everything!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so I could make Keto bagels, and they are perfect! I sprayed half of the mold with cooking spray, and left the other half un-oiled. There was no difference in how the bagels came out of the mold; all 6 came out clean and easy, leaving nothing behind stuck to the mold. So easy to clean! My husband loves the donut recipes included!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: The get the job done
customer_reviews.text: I didn't splurge for the more expensive pans because this was my first time making doughnuts. A little spray oil and the doughnuts popped right out. I've used these molds many times already because I make keto dishes and I had to make many doughnuts for my husband's birthday party. Everything turned out great!
customer_reviews.author: Veganisgreat

customer_reviews.title: Donut party! Cleans easily. But stained easily
customer_reviews.text: These molds work great. Donuts come out easily as long as you spray or oil the molds. Be sure to wipe any excess oil or cooking spray off the top flat rim, otherwise it will bake on and permanently stain the silicone. We had this happen. The top of the donut ends up being flat rather than rounded. No big deal to us, but just be aware. The molds are super easy to clean. We use them often.
customer_reviews.author: Parent

customer_reviews.title: Craving donuts?! Buy this now!!
customer_reviews.text: YUM!! I am obsessed with making donuts after using this mold! I used The Budget Mom Vanilla donut recipe (look up on Pinterest) and they came out perfect with this. Very happy how they came out, and it was super easy to clean as well! I put the tray on my bar pan so it wouldn’t leak in my oven and it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: So simple!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe I waited so long to purchase a silicone muffin mold and the donut mold was an awesome bonus! Any baked goods just slide right out of these! I was so sick of muffin tins that are impossible to clean and decided on a whim to buy these. Best decision ever! Make sure to put them on a sturdy cookie sheet before placing in the oven because they are not sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: After buying another brand of donut molds that claimed to be full sized, I reluctantly ordered these. It’s hard purchasing things online sometimes, but these are actually true donut sized! I’m thrilled with this purchase. The cooked donuts release from the molds easily and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sha-Nae-Nae

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and tasty
customer_reviews.text: These were a purchase I made to have another engaging activity to do with my son: bake donuts! And they have turned out to be a great purchase. They are easy to fill and the donuts come out easily. The recipes that come with them are also delicious. They are kind of a pain to clean, but being dishwasher safe helps. I totally recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: RLF

customer_reviews.title: GREAT little pans. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: These are great tools to have handy. They’re easy to handle, easy to use, easy to clean and easy to store. Not to mention the value! The only thing to note is you definitely need to put them on a cookie sheet when baking or you’ll have a mess! I made coffee infused chocolate donuts w/ toasted coconut within hours of receiving these pans & they came out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: These were a terrible waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Everything stuck despite COPIOUS oiling. These were a terrible waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Making baking easy
customer_reviews.text: They are wonderful. Donuts just pop out. I have to say one thing which has nothing to do with the product. The pans come with recipes. I saw pumpkin Donuts. I started pulling out everything I needed then started reading the instructions. They were all wrong. No big deal. Went online and found a recipe.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. P.

customer_reviews.title: love em!!
customer_reviews.text: good product and easy to take out the donut once done. just don't fill it up all the way, i would do half way full otherwise your donuts come out looking odd.
customer_reviews.author: Sky L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for any baker to add to their inventory
customer_reviews.text: These are really good but you must be mindful to put them on something sturdy while in the oven. Otherwise, they are good. I say good because I tried cleaning what I thought was a spot on one and put a big tear in one and had to reorder them again, so handle them gently. I honestly should’ve known better, lol. Anyway, easy to use and clean up. Love them and the colors even though they don’t match my color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: dianne

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Easy to use and make a small sized donut. The recipe card that was included seemed to have some mix up with the directions for the strawberry version. I printed off directions from a web search and found that it worked just fine with these molds. Great product and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Cooks evenly & quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I like these: easy to fill & clean, things cook evenly & quickly. My one negative is inherent to this type of cookware-it’s very floppy & sometimes a challenge as it moves this way & that. Having said that, would buy these again. I just make sure they are placed firmly on a sheet pan prior to filling & cooking.
customer_reviews.author: deniska

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these
customer_reviews.text: I've used silicone pans before and I'm pretty disappointed in this brand. Everything sticks to them just like the metal pans, even if you grease them. I'm an experienced cook and I've tried everything I know of and nothing works. Just cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Little small but gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Lot smaller than I thought. These are mini donut sizes. Little hard to clean. Put it in the dishwasher but came out with bunch of white residue. However definitely easy to take out the donuts. And I guess since it’s mini size, it helps with portion control.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Eh....why not!
customer_reviews.text: If you haven’t read it somewhere, remember you read it here- lube these suckers up like you were trying to fit a big person through a tiny window. Things WILL stick. They’re amazing to shove in cupboards and small odd spaces, so storage is a pretty big positive. I’d recommend to give it a go for the price. MrsTesterOfAllTheThings
customer_reviews.author: Mr&MrsTesterOfAllTheThings

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making donut shapes, and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I saw another reviewer used these to make keto donuts and tried them out. They are great! So easy to use and super easy to clean. I put them on a cookie sheet to stabilize in the oven, and did spray lightLy with cooking spray. Cleanup was easy both in the sink or the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Evans

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bagels & donuts!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keto bagels! Like other reviews say, they are filmsy. I put mine on a cookie sheet to begin with, but my bagels didn’t puff up. So I just carefully used oven mitts to put the silicone tray directly in the rack. It did stretch a little as I did so but it didn’t affect my bagels at all. Easy clean up and easy to portion whatever you’re making! Way better than regular steel donut tray.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great donut pans for fun family time
customer_reviews.text: Made apple cider donuts, and they were amazing. My kids are already coming up with flavor combos for us to try next. They released from the pan easily when sprayed with cooking spray and baked evenly. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DONUT PANS
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter coming for a stay and I couldn't find my metal donut pans! I decided to get this silicon version because it was inexpensive and I didn't know how much I might actually use it. We made chocolate donuts the day the pans arrived - the results were terrific, pans easy to use and clean. They are wiggly but have nice sized handles and were easy to manage with hot pads.
customer_reviews.author: L. Salo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: These are user friendly and easy to clean. If you’re looking to make real doughnuts, I would say fry them, but this is not for a healthier baked alternative. I could go without the Dunkin Donuts colors, though 😂
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product & value! Ps they're cute!
customer_reviews.text: I'm am so excited I got these! I am starting my own baking business & these are a awesome affordable starter! They are silicone for easy release & cure colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amber mfin Savage

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for doughnut making
customer_reviews.text: These make the nicest doughnuts. My wife loves them and I love the doughnuts. Easy clean--easy removal of doughnut. The silicone won't stick like more expensive metal molds. Just a good product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond H. Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to make Halloween donuts and they cane out great. Very easy to use and no no problems removing the donuts.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: my wife used this to make her vegan donuts. Cleans easy and holds up well
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Randel

customer_reviews.title: They’re ok
customer_reviews.text: Let’s start with the good things: I really like the size of the donuts, and they have held up well in the dishwasher. The material is too flimsy to use without setting in a jelly roll pan before putting batter into them. I usually have to scrub at least a couple of them out to clean them even if I use cooking spray.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Clopp

customer_reviews.title: Too tiny
customer_reviews.text: These are super mini. If your looking for a normal size donut or bagel, then don't buy this. The quality is good, but other then that, way too little. You can use these for children's baked goods.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Wow, love these!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used a lot of silicone pans in the past but thought I'd give these a try... Wow! The price was beyond great and the pans are amazing. They work so well on my bagels. I highly recommend them, highly!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks ok on arrival, but the two pans are not identical
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to get two bagel (donut) pans. Only one is for bagels, the other (cleverly hidden behind the first pan) is pattered, kind of fancy like a rose or miniature Nordic small round pan. I was disappointed in that. I don't know how my keto bagels will turn out.
customer_reviews.author: TryHarderDarter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Homemade donuts just got easier. Highly recommend. Easy to clean, easy to use and easy to remove the donuts. They don't hold heat a long time after use, so that's great too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Maddux

customer_reviews.title: Silicone doughnut trays
customer_reviews.text: I made keto doughnuts in these trays. The doughnuts came out great and I used them in a regular oven. Easy to use and clean. Great price for 2 pans. Easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: linsteele

customer_reviews.title: Work great for baked doughnuts.
customer_reviews.text: The only knock against these is that they get dirty and the stains can't be washed out, but it's not like our other bakeware is pristine, so it's not a big deal. Easy way to make doughnuts.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect donuts every time!
customer_reviews.text: These molds are a dream! The silicone makes them so easy to work with as the donuts come right out, no oil or butter required! For others complaining that these are flimsy? Well yeah, they're silicone, the flexibility is part of the appeal. Like I stated, the cakes pop right out with a little bend of the mold. Just place molds on a baking sheet while in the oven so they're easier to retrieve once finished. Anyway, this ended up being a really simple and fun addition to my baking supplies. Glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rose

customer_reviews.title: Home made donuts, baked!
customer_reviews.text: These donut pans are just wheat I needed. I had a Weight Watchers recipe for baked donuts and the recommended these pans. so as usual I found then on Amazon..... Great donuts!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Gentile

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Was able to make baked donuts, tasted good and more so looked like donuts which is what this product was meant to do. Just keep in mind, if you're expecting the product to rise, fill up the molds 2/3rds full.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kabbabe

customer_reviews.title: Great for keto donuts
customer_reviews.text: I use it for making keto Donuts. It would be better if it were just a little bit deeper, but it is pretty awesome as is.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J.

customer_reviews.title: Used and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived out of originally packaging and it had stuff on it. It was an obviously used or previously returned product. The silicone was very thin in spots and cheaply made. We will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this !
customer_reviews.text: For such a cheap price and getting two molds this is awesome. I used it to mold soap I used two of the molds and stuck them together to look like an actual donut.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good but the non stick isn't the best
customer_reviews.text: I love these little donut pans. I forgot to spray them the second time I used the and my donuts were close to impossible to remove without tearing them apart. I do not mind spraying them and love the fact that they're silicone so I can easily pop them out once they're sprayed but I wouldn't call them nonstick without the spray.
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: Silicone gets really hot!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and while they make great shape donuts for some reason they always set off my smoke alarms. Not sure if it’s because the silicone gets so hot but I’m going to switch to traditional metal or ceramic pans.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: Great..
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use these yet but super excited to. Update: used them are they worked out really well. Super easy to remove the donuts after baking. No sticking at all. Only thing I noticed is that u have to keep a very firm, wide and steady grip on both sides of the "Pan" because it is flexible. Definitely wants to just bend and squish with the batter in it. Overall I'm happy with them though.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Pros- easy to use and easy to store. Cons- kind of flops around when putting in the oven and removing from the oven because the silicone is soft and found it a little tedious to clean (I’ll admi though, I hate washing dishes lol). Overall a good product though. I’d buy more in different donut sizes in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Aca

customer_reviews.title: Great got Bagels
customer_reviews.text: I have been on Keto and make keto cheese bread. These molds are exactly what I needed to make my mini bagels for sandwiches and bread for toasting.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kadinger

customer_reviews.title: Protein donuts
customer_reviews.text: What more can I say? I use these for protein donuts, and they make me feel like I'm eating a yummy donut! My kids love them too~
customer_reviews.author: Reader for Life!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean and works FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: Being on WW I'm always looking for something to help with my healthy eating and I recently discovered baked 'donuts'. This silicon baking pan is absolutely a WW essential! Works great, even baking and clean up is easy, too. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bess

customer_reviews.title: They turn WHITE when pinched...
customer_reviews.text: I sent these back because they DO turn white when pinched. I am using this for my kiddos and do not feel safe that they did not pass the 'white pinch test' even though they claim they do!?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Donuts
customer_reviews.text: Perfect donuts! Baked well and evenly and then almost fell out to the cooling rack. Used a little Pam spray before filling. Would definitely buy again. Ignore the mini ones in this pic- that’s from a different pan. The big ones are from the silicon pans.
customer_reviews.author: Marina L. Bigsby

customer_reviews.title: Good molds!
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make apple cider donuts. They came out perfect! The molds were sprayed with non stick cooking spray first. The donuts lifted out of the molds!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Ondish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to throw it in the dishwasher. Also, I have no issues with sticking when I spray the bottom and work the edges with my fingers. So glad I didn't fork out more money for a metal pan!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: this is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I is really unfortunate! whetever you back stick on it, and it is ruined. I baked same thing in different molds, and the result out of this disappointing. Your pastry will not be in one piece, will break and not be successful no matter what you do. this is failure 100%
customer_reviews.author: Estapraq Kahlil

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! It’s such a great quality plus it came with recipes book...I trued 2 of them and they came out delicious...what a great product for such a low price
customer_reviews.author: vera

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick and clean up like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these pans!! Made keto "bagels" and they popped right out! I did spray lightly with cooking spray first. Cleans up easily!
customer_reviews.author: Julia P.

customer_reviews.title: These work WONDERFULLY for my ketogenic doughnuts
customer_reviews.text: These work WONDERFULLY for my ketogenic doughnuts. I still use a coconut oil cooking spray for ease of release (baked goods can still stick - though that may be my fault for not having the patience to let them cool).
customer_reviews.author: Audrey J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect donuts every time!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these donut pans. I've used the recipes that came with the pans and one other to make donuts every weekend for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: liliana

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell when cooking
customer_reviews.text: Definitely give off a weird smell when cooking. Idk if it’s not compatible with my oven or something but I took them out of the oven after only a few minutes
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: They work fine, I would have preferred metal pans but I ...
customer_reviews.text: They work fine, I would have preferred metal pans but I figured I'd give silicone a try. They are very hard to clean and don't get clean in the dishwasher. However, It probably is easier to remove the donut from this then the metal pan though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these for donuts
customer_reviews.text: We have loved having these! The kids love having donut whenever and there are so many recipes on Pinterest. We have even done pancake donuts which the kids loved.
customer_reviews.author: EDesie

customer_reviews.title: Homemade donuts!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make my own keto donuts. They do a great job and make perfect donuts. They're easy to clean and easy to get the donuts out.
customer_reviews.author: london8875

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These make small donuts. I like the built in portion control, but I mention it in case you're looking for full size donuts. The protein donut recipe I tried was awful! But, the pan worked great; no sticking, easy to clean and easy to store. I think I'm going to replace my cupcake pans next with silicone. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: Casas

customer_reviews.title: Prefer these over the metal
customer_reviews.text: I love these silicon molds! They are so much better than the metal ones. They are easy to clean and way easier to take the donuts out without them breaking
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Do it!
customer_reviews.text: I’d buy these again in a heartbeat. So convenient and easy! Cleaning is a breeze and food doesn’t stick. I honestly am so impressed with these donut trays
customer_reviews.author: Lauren U

customer_reviews.title: Nice molds!
customer_reviews.text: Nice donut molds, love the colors. I found the feel and the quality to be a bit questionable, comparing to other silicone baking products. It feels slightly thinner than others and has a very strong chemical scent. Works well, though =)
customer_reviews.author: sannyasin

product_meta.title: HEHALI Silicone Donut Pan, 2pcs Non-Stick Mold, Silicone Donut Mold for 6 Full-Size Donuts, Bagels and More
feature_bullets: Size: 10 x 7 x 1 inches, the diameter of each cavity is about 3 inch, and 6 cavities in total, ideal for the use of whole family. This silicone donut mold is firmer and more durable compared to normal ones, and it can also be applied to other dessert.
Easy To Use: Our silicone donut pan will fit perfectly in your oven; Simply place the pan on a cookie sheet, fill and bake following your recipe instructions.
Once cleaned simply fold the muffin into a storage space until next use, the flexibility of silicone allows the pan to be folded without damage, it simply unfolds back to its initial shape.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,083 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
